item.title: Aditya Birla Group to tap franchise partners for jewellery brand expansion | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
Aditya Birla Group to Tap Franchise Partners for Jewellery Brand Expansion

Date: Not specified Source: Live Mint

The Aditya Birla Group is looking to expand its jewellery brand, Indriya, by collaborating with franchise partners to open 100 new stores within 18 months, making a significant entry into India's lucrative branded jewellery market valued at ₹6.7 trillion ($81 billion).

  • The group aims to broaden its presence in the jewellery sector which it entered with a ₹5,000 crore ($610 million) investment last year.
  • Indriya currently has 12 stores in major cities including Delhi, Mumbai, Indore, Jaipur, and Ahmedabad.
"We plan to open 100 stores over the next 18 months..." - Top Executive

This initiative reflects the conglomerate's aggressive strategy to penetrate the expanding jewellery market in India.

item.title: Xiaomi Pad 7 review in 10 points - India Today
item.description:
Xiaomi Pad 7 Review: 10 Key Highlights

Date: January 2025 | Source: India Today

The Xiaomi Pad 7 is a versatile Android tablet priced below Rs 30,000 that combines performance with a sleek design. It is aimed at consumers looking for an affordable yet high-quality tablet solution.

  • Lightweight at just 500g and 6.18mm thin, enhancing portability.
  • 11.2-inch LCD display offering 3.2K resolution and 144Hz refresh rate.
  • Powered by Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3 chipset with up to 12GB RAM.
  • Features HyperOS 2 for a clean interface and productivity tools.
  • Quad speakers with Dolby Atmos for an immersive audio experience.
  • 8,850mAh battery with 7 hours of usage and 45W fast charging.
  • Equipped with a 13MP rear camera and an ultra-wide front camera for video calls.
  • Supports accessories like the Focus Keyboard and Pen at an extra cost.
  • Start price of Rs 26,999 with a more premium option available at Rs 31,999.
  • Excellent choice for budget-conscious buyers.
“If you are planning to buy an Android tablet under Rs 30,000 then Xiaomi’s latest Pad 7 needs all your attention.”

In summary, the Xiaomi Pad 7 provides strong performance and a lightweight design, making it a commendable option for budget tablet seekers.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim leaks: Design, battery, display, and everything else to know - India Today
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim leaks: Design, battery, display, and everything else to know

Published On: Jan 17, 2025 By: Aman Rashid

Samsung is set to reveal the Galaxy S25 Slim at the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22, alongside the S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra. This model is anticipated to be the thinnest in the series at just 6.4mm thick.

  • The S25 Slim will feature a 6.7 to 6.8-inch display.
  • Expected battery capacity is between 3,000 mAh and 4,000 mAh.
  • It will pack Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset with 12GB RAM.
  • Camera setup includes a 200MP primary camera, 50MP ultra-wide, and 50MP telephoto with 3.5x optical zoom.
“The slim design may impact the overall battery capacity, which is expected to be between 3,000 mAh and 4,000 mAh.”

While the specs sound promising, there are concerns about how the slim design will affect battery life and performance. More details are expected during the Unpacked event.

item.title: Nothing Phone 3 launching in March 2025? Here’s what we want from the upcoming flagship - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Nothing Phone 3 launch is expected before March 2025, based on reports. Here's what we want it to offer.

Date: January 17, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

The Nothing Phone 3 is set to be the next major flagship from Nothing, with an expected launch before March 2025. Recent leaks and an internal email from founder Carl Pei suggest significant advancements in design and AI features for the new smartphone.

  • Launch expected before March 2025 due to growing demand for new devices.
  • The Nothing Phone 3 aims to introduce major advancements in user interface design.
  • Anticipated to feature powerful specifications, potentially including Snapdragon 8 Gen 3.
  • Improvements in Nothing OS functionality and user experience are expected.

“The Nothing Phone 3 will be a landmark smartphone launch,” - Carl Pei

The Nothing Phone 3 represents an exciting evolution in the smartphone lineup from Nothing, especially as the company aims to refine its products while introducing innovative features.

item.title: Apple Made AI Mistakes? Media Uproar Forces Tech Giant to Suspend 'AI News Feature' - Outlook Business
item.description:
Apple Suspends AI News Feature Due to Media Backlash

Publication Date: October 2023
Source: Outlook Business

Apple has temporarily suspended its AI news feature after backlash from media organizations over frequent inaccuracies in its news summaries.

  • The feature previously rolled out for iPhone 16 and select iPads and Macs.
  • It generated incorrect notifications regarding news events, including a false report about a murder suspect.
  • The BBC and other media outlets expressed serious concerns over the inaccuracies and trust issues.
  • The National Union of Journalists called for immediate removal of the feature to prevent misinformation.
  • Apple plans to implement a software update to address these issues in the future.
“It is essential to us that our audiences can trust any information or journalism published in our name and that includes notifications” - BBC

The negative press and user complaints have led Apple to pause the feature while it works on improvements to ensure reliability in its news alerts.

item.title: iPhone 17 Air to arrive this year: 10 features to look forward to - India Today
item.description:
iPhone 17 Air to arrive this year: 10 features to look forward to

Publication Date: TBD   Source: India Today

Apple is rumored to introduce its thinnest iPhone ever, the iPhone 17 Air, with several new features including a sleek design and advanced specifications.

  • The iPhone 17 Air will reportedly have a thickness of just 5.5mm.
  • It is expected to feature a 6.6-inch OLED display with Face ID and Dynamic Island.
  • ProMotion support for up to 120Hz refresh rate is another anticipated feature.
  • The device may be powered by the upcoming A19 chipset.
  • An 8GB RAM is expected to enhance its performance.
  • A single 48-megapixel rear camera is likely to be included.
  • The front camera may consist of 24 megapixels for improved selfies and video calls.
  • The device is expected to exclusively support e-SIM, doing away with physical SIM slots.
  • It might be the first in the iPhone series to introduce an in-house 5G modem.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6, Z Flip 6 discounted during festive offers- All details - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6, Z Flip 6 discounted during festive offers- All details

Publication Date: Jan 17, 2025 12:20 PM IST
Source: Hindustan Times

The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6 and Galaxy Z Flip 6 are available at discounted prices during the Samsung Festive Offers in India, coinciding with Republic Day celebrations.

  • The Galaxy Z Fold 6 starts at Rs.164999 with Rs.15000 instant cashback or 24 months no-cost EMI.
  • The Galaxy Z Flip 6 retails for Rs.109999 with Rs.20000 instant cashback or 24 months no-cost EMI.
  • Both models feature improvements in design, performance with Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, and unique AI functionalities.
The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6 and Galaxy Z Flip 6 could be ideal purchases for anyone wanting to switch to foldable smartphones.

This festive season offers a great opportunity for consumers to purchase these elite foldable smartphones at reduced prices.

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: India Today

During the Flipkart Monumental sale, the Samsung Galaxy S24+ is witnessing a great discount. The flagship phone is now available for Rs 59,999, down from Rs 99,999.

  • Current price of Galaxy S24+ is Rs 59,999 after a Rs 40,000 discount.
  • With additional bank offers, users can purchase the phone for Rs 56,999.

  • The Galaxy S24+ features AI capabilities and comes in five colors.
  • Specifications include a 6.7-inch display and a 50-megapixel camera with a 120Hz refresh rate.
  • Powered by Samsung Exynos 2400 SoC and a 4,900mAh battery.
“This Rs 40,000 discount gets even better with an additional bank discount.”

The Samsung Galaxy S24+ offers significant savings ahead of the anticipated Galaxy S25 launch.

Redeem codes for January 17

How to Redeem Free Fire MAX codes

Follow these steps to redeem the codes:

  1. Visit the official Free Fire MAX rewards redemption website: reward.ff.garena.com.
  2. Log in using your Free Fire MAX account credentials (Google, Facebook, Twitter, or VK).

Free Fire MAX: Things to know about the game

  • Currently available in India.
  • The original Free Fire game remains banned in India.
  • Redeem codes may show an error message if expired or incorrect.
  • Act quickly, as these codes are time-sensitive.

Always use valid codes and official sources to avoid errors.

item.title: Apple disables AI summaries for news temporarily - The Hindu
item.description:
Apple Disables AI Summaries for News Temporarily

Date: January 17, 2025 Source: The Hindu

Apple has temporarily paused its AI news summary feature after multiple complaints of inaccurate headlines, deactivating it on iOS 18.3, iPadOS 18.3, and macOS Sequoia 15.3 betas.

  • The pause was prompted by complaints from BBC and other news outlets regarding false reports.
  • In December, a false notification claimed that a suspect charged with the death of a CEO shot himself.
  • In November, a notification incorrectly stated that Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu had been arrested.
  • Recent summaries involving WSJ journalist notifications were also inaccurate.
  • Apple plans to improve and reintroduce the feature in the future, alongside an updated notification style.
  • Users will have more control over these notifications, including the ability to toggle them directly from the lock screen.
"Apple plans to improve the feature and then release it again in the future."

The temporary suspension reflects Apple's commitment to accuracy and user control in news reporting features.

item.title: Realme to supercharge smartphone design with 300% boost to ID talent, 450% R&D investment in 2025 | Exclusive - The Financial Express
item.description:
Realme to Boost Smartphone Design and R&D Investments by 2025

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: financialexpress.com

Realme's founder and CEO, Sky Li, discusses the company's ambitious plans for 2025, including a 450% increase in R&D investment and a 300% boost in Industrial Design talent. The Realme 14 Pro series, aimed at tech-savvy youth, focuses on innovation, design aesthetics, and advanced camera capabilities.

  • The target market for the Realme 14 Pro series consists of young adults valuing innovation and performance.
  • Realme aims to enhance user experience with India-specific software and colour variants.
  • Notable growth in 2024 included an 117% rise in Western Europe and 281% in Latin America.
  • The 14 Pro series focuses on high-performance features like advanced camera technology and impressive battery life.
  • Significant investment in quad-curved display technology emphasizing user experience.

“India remains a key pillar of our success, where we [have] reinforced our position as the most popular smartphone brand among the youth.” - Sky Li

The Realme 14 Pro series showcases the company’s focus on innovation, targeting an expansion in both local and global markets. Their commitment to R&D will significantly influence future smartphone design and user experience.

item.title: Nintendo releases first look trailer of Switch 2 console: Watch it here - Business Standard
item.description:
Nintendo releases first look trailer of Switch 2 console: Watch it here

Publication Date: March 2023, Source: Nintendo News

Nintendo has unveiled the first look at its upcoming handheld gaming console, the Nintendo Switch 2, featuring a larger display and redesigned Joy-Cons. A full reveal is expected at the upcoming Nintendo Direct event.

  • Nintendo has released a first look trailer for the Switch 2.
  • The new console features a larger display and new Joy-Cons.
  • Backward compatibility is confirmed for the new console.
  • A redesigned Joy-Con attachment mechanism is introduced.
  • A new Mario Kart game was teased in the trailer.
  • More details will be revealed at the Nintendo Direct event on April 2.
“While the company did not reveal the specification of the second-generation Switch console, it did say that the Nintendo Switch 2 will be released this year.”

The anticipated Nintendo Switch 2 promises to enhance the gaming experience with innovative design and new titles, with full details expected soon.

item.title: Nintendo’s new Switch 2 console will come out this year - The Hindu
item.description:
Nintendo to Launch New Switch 2 Console This Year

Date: January 17, 2025 Source: The Hindu

Nintendo has officially announced the upcoming release of its new console, the Nintendo Switch 2, much to the excitement of gamers worldwide. This console is set to play exclusive games as well as existing Nintendo Switch games.

  • The Nintendo Switch 2 will be released in 2025.
  • The new console features larger design and redesigned Joy-Cons that attach to the main unit.
  • It will support a range of exclusive and existing games, although some may not be fully compatible.
  • Nintendo plans to reveal more details during an upcoming Nintendo Direct event in April.
  • There will be hands-on experience events in cities including Los Angeles, New York, London, and Paris starting in April.
"More information about the system will be available during the company’s April Nintendo Direct event."

As anticipation builds, Nintendo fans await further details on the Switch 2, which promises to enhance their gaming experience.

item.title: Apple Watch saves life of a 55-year-old man after he passes out while driving - India Today
item.description:
Apple Watch Saves Life of 55-Year-Old Man After Driving Incident

Published On: Jan 17, 2025 | Source: Aman Rashid

A 55-year-old man from Easthampton, Massachusetts, credits his Apple Watch for saving his life after a terrifying car crash left him trapped upside down in a swimming pool.

On December 16, Brent Hill blacked out while driving, resulting in his car veering off the road and crashing into a neighbor's garage before landing in their swimming pool. The watch detected the accident and called emergency services, providing guidance that helped him stay calm until help arrived.

  • Hill lost consciousness while driving, leading to a crash.
  • The Apple Watch's crash detection feature alerted emergency services.
  • Emergency responders saved him before the situation could worsen.
  • Hill sustained only minor injuries despite the severity of the crash.
  • Neighbor Elizabeth Laprade-Appelquist expressed amazement at the watch's role in the rescue.
  • Hill hopes to raise awareness about the lifesaving potential of technology.
“This feature saved my life. It’s a reminder that these devices are more than just gadgets; they can be lifesavers.” - Brent Hill

This incident highlights the invaluable role of smartwatches in emergencies, showcasing technology's potential to save lives.

item.title: Crash Detection on Apple Watch helps save man after passing out while driving - India Today
item.description:
Apple Watch Saves Life of 55-Year-Old Man After Car Crash

Published On: Jan 17, 2025

Published By: Aman Rashid

A 55-year-old man from Easthampton, Massachusetts, was saved by his Apple Watch after passing out while driving and crashing into a swimming pool.

Key Points:

  • Brent Hill blacked out while driving and crashed into a neighbor's swimming pool.
  • The Apple Watch detected the crash and called emergency services.
  • Hill was trapped upside down in the car but was guided by the watch's voice until help arrived.
  • He sustained minor injuries but credited the watch with saving his life.
  • Neighbor Elizabeth Laprade-Appelquist was surprised by the effectiveness of the watch's crash detection.
“If emergency services had not contacted me through that watch and coached me through it, there’s no way I would’ve got out of there.” - Brent Hill

This incident highlights the potential life-saving capabilities of technology during emergencies and encourages awareness about such features in smart devices.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim may feature smaller battery compared to rest of the Galaxy S25 lineup - India Today
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim May Feature Smaller Battery Compared to Rest of the Galaxy S25 Lineup

Published On: Jan 17, 2025 | Published By: Nandini Yadav

As Samsung's Galaxy Unpacked event approaches, leaks indicate that the Galaxy S25 Slim will have the smallest battery capacity in the new lineup, designed to be the thinnest model yet.

  • The Galaxy S25 Slim's battery is rumored to be between 3,000mAh and 4,000mAh.
  • It measures just 6.4mm thick without the camera module, setting a new standard for smartphone slimness.
  • Despite its slimness, it boasts a large display between 6.7 to 6.8 inches.
  • The design includes a metal frame, glass back, and triple rear cameras.
  • Scheduled announcement is on January 22, 2025, during Samsung's Galaxy Unpacked event.
“The Slim is rumoured to be even thinner than the Galaxy S25 Ultra.”

This model is anticipated to feature advanced hardware while maintaining a stylish, ultra-thin profile, surpassing previous models like the Galaxy A8.

item.title: Apple to halt AI-generated news alerts after errors - BBC.com
item.description:
Apple Halts AI-Generated News Alerts Amid Criticism

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: [Your News Source]

Apple has decided to suspend its AI feature that generated news alerts after receiving complaints about the accuracy of the information it provided.

  • The feature faced backlash for sending faulty news summaries, including misinformation regarding a criminal incident.
  • Major media organizations, including the BBC, criticized the accuracy of AI-generated alerts, citing issues with trust and misinformation.
  • Apple plans to work on improvements for the AI feature for a future software update.
  • The news alert feature has been disabled entirely for news and entertainment apps.
  • This decision follows the company's efforts to showcase its AI advancements amidst investor expectations.
“We're pleased that Apple has listened to our concerns and is pausing the summarization feature for news,” a BBC spokesperson stated.

In conclusion, Apple's decision reflects the challenges of implementing AI in sensitive areas like news dissemination and highlights the importance of accuracy in building trust with audiences.

item.title: Today’s NYT Connections Hints, Answers for January 17, 2025 - Beebom

This article provides hints and answers for the NYT Connections game #586 on January 17, 2025, aimed at helping players resolve the puzzle more easily.

  • Green Category: To hit something
  • Blue Category: Impossible to browse the Internet without these
  • Purple Category: You drink these to unwind

The answers for the categories are:

  • FRANKFURTER: Banger, Brat, Link, Sausage
  • STRIKE: Bop, Hit, Knock, Tap

  • ENDING WITH BEER BRANDS: Autoharp, Contrabass, Pepperoni, Rosebud

item.description:
Crunch Fitness CEO Urges Employee Sacrifice for Success Amid L&T Work Week Debate

Published Date: 17 Jan, 2025 | Source: LiveMint

The debate surrounding L&T's 90-hour work week has spurred Crunch Fitness CEO Jim Rowley to claim that employees must be willing to sacrifice for success, dismissing the concept of work-life balance as a lack of commitment.

  • Jim Rowley argues that the modern ethos of work-life balance reflects a lack of dedication.
  • He emphasizes that hard work is essential for success in the fitness industry.
“These new modern concepts are ‘illusions’ and we should focus on hard work instead,” Jim Rowley stated during the live update.

This statement comes amid various corporate news updates that touch on significant financial and operational changes in multiple industries.
